docs.snippet: Estimated financial losses from the deadly Washington mudslide that has killed at least 24 people have reached $10 million, Gov. Jay Inslee said Monday in a letter asking the federal government for a major disaster declaration....
docs.lead_paragraph: Estimated financial losses from the deadly Washington mudslide that has killed at least 24 people have reached $10 million, Gov. Jay Inslee said Monday in a letter asking the federal government for a major disaster declaration.

headline.main: More Mudslide Victims Found as State Seeks New Aid

docs.snippet: Josh Elliott ends a three-year run as the ABC program’s news anchor during which the show defeated its NBC-owned rival, “Today,” amid fierce competition....
docs.lead_paragraph: Josh Elliott ends a three-year run as the ABC program’s news anchor during which the show defeated its NBC-owned rival, “Today,” amid fierce competition.
docs.abstract: NBC Sports hires Josh Elliott away from Good Morning America, where he has worked for past three years as news anchor and lifestyle reporter; Elliott, who has extensive background in sports television, having previously worked as an anchor at ESPN.

docs.snippet: One of Alex Ferguson's avowed aims during his long reign as Manchester United manager was, famously, "to knock Liverpool off their perch" as the most successful club side in England....

docs.snippet: A vicious ice storm that made Christmas week a nightmare from the Midwest to Maine shattered hundreds of trees at Michigan State University, where inch-thick layers of ice snapped thick limbs and trunks of stately towers that had stood for generat...
docs.lead_paragraph: A vicious ice storm that made Christmas week a nightmare from the Midwest to Maine shattered hundreds of trees at Michigan State University, where inch-thick layers of ice snapped thick limbs and trunks of stately towers that had stood for generations.

headline.main: In Ice-Damaged Towns, a Difficult Choice on Trees

docs.abstract: Advertising column; campaign by Major League Baseball's new lead creative agency, BBDO New York, will focus on fans' love of game with salute to opening day kicking off effort and will feature young stars.

docs.snippet: World Wrestling Entertainment has positioned itself on the cutting edge of Internet television with its new subscription-only streaming video service....
docs.lead_paragraph: World Wrestling Entertainment has positioned itself on the cutting edge of Internet television with its new subscription-only streaming video service.
docs.abstract: World Wrestling Entertainment is positioning itself on cutting edge of Internet television with its new WWE Network subscription-only streaming video service; network broadcasts pro wrestling events once available only on cable and satellite television; company's shares have more than tripled over last year with introduction of subscription network and takeover rumors.

headline.main: WWE Network Is Loud Introduction to the Video Streaming Ring
